Reviews.Title: Great service
Reviews.Author: HDY
Reviews.Content: Thanks for providing a very fast service. Everything was as described.Would not hesitate using your company again.Regards,Steve

Reviews.Title: Very durable
Reviews.Author: A. Jarnegan
Reviews.Content: It takes a little effort getting the cable out of the package,but these are really good cables.they work well,and are durible

Reviews.Title: Good Cable
Reviews.Author: Dan Proctor
Reviews.Content: This is a heavy duty cable compared to the very thin cables that are supplied with most cameras.  The thin cables are very easy to damage during installation.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: RASHAWN
Reviews.Content: I choose this product for the name and the rating. I would recommend this product to anyone need a CCTV cable. Also quick delivery

Reviews.Title: Cable
Reviews.Author: Tom Hunter
Reviews.Content: Very good cable much better than the Junk they give you when you buy the DVR with the Cameras. Heavier gauge wire. Problem although I went on Swann's webisite to buy it with the same connectors (green ones) they were all sold out and then Customer service told me to search on the web to find it at a competitor site? Why they do not stock their own cables? I do not know - when I got the cables the ends were different so I disconnected the one end connector and hard wired it in to the other end connector.

Reviews.Title: Exact Match to SWPRO-751 Camera (PTZ), a no-brainer to hook up
Reviews.Author: R. Shank
Reviews.Content: Since the cable that is included in the  Swann SWPRO-751CAM-US PTZ Camera with 12x Optical Zoom (White) is a 50-footer, I ordered the 100 foot to make the run from the Swann DVR to my chimney. This is the correct cable to mate to both units!

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Leonard Decormier
Reviews.Content: Great cable heavy duty  better then the ones that comes with the cameras will use same ones when in date  my camers

ProductInfo.Features:
Easy to connect co-ax extension with 3-in-1 OSD control, video power
RS845 connection for cameras with OSD (On Screen Display) /PTZ capability
75 ohm, double shielded & weather resistant to withstand harsh conditions
Send power to your camera via this cable
ProductInfo.Name: Swann SWPRO-30MCAB-GL 3-In-1 Multi-Purpose 100-Feet BNC Cable (White)
